unnormalised: Bora, tor, tumi Bharatak ek bhonvdi yeujit asa, vo poryan tumkam matyek ghara dhaddpak zai? Sogllea banking ani rokde vixim uloup thodem okhem disonk xokta, nhem? Chinta korunk naka, hanv thoi aslom, tem kelam, ani T-shirt ghetlam (jem, BTW, Linking Roadacher mhaka ₹350 podlem). Tumchem duddu ek pro bhaxen koxem samballchem tem sangtan.
normalised: Bore, mhunnllear, tumi Bharatak prove korpak sodtat, vo tumkam ghara kaim poiso dhaddpak zai asa? Bank ani poixeanchi hi vostu samzop thodi kotthin assa, kiteak nhoi? Chinta korunk naka, hanv thoinch aslo, hem kelam, ani t-shirt mell'lla (zo, mhojea matan, Linking Road-acher rupiya tin xẽdd'dde ani pon'nas rupiya poddlo). Tumchea poixeancho vevhar kaso korcho hachi mahiti diunk di.

unnormalised: Poile suvater, ami ATM vixim uloiya. Tem tuka vhoddlea xarani soglleak melltolem. Punn fokot ek suchovnni, Bharotantlea choddxea ATM-anchea kadpachi sima asta. Samany ritin, ti ek transakshnanchea zodd ₹10,000 te ₹20,000 asteli. Mhunnche, tumi ek vhoddli rakkham kadpacho ujeas kortat zalear, tumkam don tin transakshon korche poddtele vo bankache bhitor vochchem poddttolem. Toxench, ghara pasun tumchi bank astat ty ATM-anchea feesacher talle dovora. Tem kadnneak $5 bhaxen xokta, mhunnche tem bhitor gheun ghea!
normalised: Poileach pon'nachea bhagak, A-T-M-s babt korta. Tim zoriant vhodda xaranchea bhitare tumkam melltele. Punn ek uzvardi dhi, Bharotantle zaite A-T-M-s kaddechi xima asta. Sadearonnponnacher, ek pon'nachea bhitar tin xẽdd'dde rupiya dhakun rupiya vis xẽdd'dde rupiya asta. Mhunnllear, tumi zoriant dhon aslo kaddechi korta zalear, tumi don pon'nache vikas korunk poddte vo tumi bankache bhitar vochunk poddte. Ani thoichea dhokebaaz A-T-M feescher tumchea ghara fattimchea bankan bhartonk diunk zait. Dollar pon'nani kaddechi poddunk zata, mhunnllear tem vichar korunk di!

unnormalised: Bankanchi ulovnni kortana, ek sthanik khato ugddap him thodi trasachi dista, punn tumi thodde tempak ravonk asa zalear, ti jivonacher ek xevonni astoli. SBI (State Bank of India) vo HDFC sarkhea banka samany bhaxen mellttat. Tumkam tumchem paspot, visa, ani sthanik adresachi sid'dhota zai poddtoli. Te samany bhaxen nim'michem balans zai poddta, samany bhaxen bank ani khateachem prakaracher adharit ₹2,000 te ₹5,000 zai poddta. Kagdpatrachem kam thodem trasachi astolem, mhunnche xoky zalear apli bhonvdi fudden gheun ya.
normalised: Bankanche babt korta zalear, tumchi sthanik lekho ugddapak thodo borecho dista, punn tumi thodde disa astole zalear, tem jivatall asta. S-B-I (Bharotachea Bankacho Ghonddh) vo H-D-F-C hea banki sadearonn asta. Tumkam tumcho passport, visa, ani ghara babticho sthanik puravo zai poddto. Sadearonnponnacher, tankam nirmann zata dhon astole zalear rupiya tin xẽdd'dde dhakun rupiya ponch xẽdd'dde rupiya poddto, bank ani lekheachea akaracher nirmann zata. Lekh babtichea pattranchea akaracher thoda kotthin assa, mhunnllear tumchi proveak poileach ye.

unnormalised: Atam, digital lokanchi vishai! UPI (Unified Payments Interface) haka, hangachea transakshanancho raza bhaxen mantat. Chai vallean pasun dhon'nanchea restoranmeren soglle uzar kortat. Venmo-chea Bharotantlea roopacho vichar kora, punn tem dusrea chodd vanttun poddlolem asa. Tem ugddapasun tumkam ek Bharotantlea bankachem khato ani ek sthanik SIM card zai poddttolem. Tumi bhitor astat mhunnosor, tumi konakui fokot ek QR code sken korun vo tancho UPI ID (tem samany bhaxen nam@bankachem nam bhaxen dista) bhorton duddu bhortam. Super faidea divpi, tbh.
normalised: Aata, digital lokanchea khatir! U-P-I (Ek Zoddnnukacho Vevaracho Sahity) mhunnllear, hea ponnachea vevaracho raza. Chai vallye dhakun vhoddlea restaurant meren te vevarak vaparta. Tumi tem Venmo-che Bharotachea prakarach vichar korunk di, punn thode faav Bharotachea zoriant zallelar. Tumkam Bharotachi bank lekho ani sthanik S-I-M pattrachea ghetlelek zai poddto. Tumam bhitar aslo zalear, tumi khonnakui pon'nachea dhonnachem Q-R code vo tumchen U-P-I I-D ghaltun dinvk zatat (tem sadearonnponnacher ulochna bankname-ancher dista). Zoriant boreponnachea vevarak boreponn di.

unnormalised: Rokddek duddu ajun thoddea dhakttea ganvni ani gramani raja asta. Kredit carda, US-ant zoxe vapurta toslea vantteak hanga kabul korina. Mhunnche, sadhi ritin thodde rupiya lagim dovora. Hacho vichar aso kora: ATM tumche shining armor-achea chevalier-an, UPI tumcho ninja assassin lagim vegim bhortalek, ani rokddek duddu tumchi porni torvar zoxe sokllea vishayanik favona. Sarke bhaxen soglleanchi mellavnni dovrunk favo!
normalised: Poiss'o at'tanui thoddea thoddea ganv ani gõvam zoriant raaza aasa. Credit card thoddea ugdda dhonnacho nhoi, sangpak poddta, U-S-antle ponnachem nhoi. Mhunnllear, tumi zaite rupiya sadhi korunk di. Hem prakarach vichar korunk di: A-T-M-s tumchea zorinche zorinche bhitarle rani asta, U-P-I tumchea dharadar kaddek diunche, ani poiss'o tumchea purnnea talvari ponnache dhiunche. Tem zoriant tinui vostunche mishrann zornneak di.

unnormalised: Tumi koronsi ekschinz kortat zalear, vostacher asat ty dodgy-distea munxanichi bhook lagunk naka. Adhikar diyak dil'lea rokdek duddu ekschinz korpachea vo bankanchea kodden ravonk zai. Te tumkam faidea divpi dar ditole, ani tumi khotte noteanchea kodden ghootalo zaink dita te vatter tumi asunk nant. Rosid sambhallon dovora – tim tumi vellanim duddu ekschinz korunk upyogi poddtoli. Ani ekschinz-achem dar bodoltolem, mhunnche tumi vochunk poilim tem online polleunk zai. Aiz tem $1-ak ₹83 bhaxen asonk xokta, punn udya konn zanno?
normalised: Tumi por'khi dhanancho vevhar kartalzalear, tumi rasteancher dhoka diunche lokacho porivar korunk naka. Tumam parvann diunche dhanancho vevhar korpak poddta. Tumkam zoriant boreponn diunche darr di, ani tumi khottea pattrachea vevaran fassun poddche dhonnachem nhoi. Tumchi rassiptti jaton dhon di – tem tumchem poiss'o ghara vadpak diunche zalear vevarak zonn poddtta. Ani vevaracho dar kaddek bodolta, mhunnllear tumchi provea poilear vevarak pas korunk di. Aaja, tem dollaarak rupiya tin xẽdd'dde ani aatti poddunk zatat, punn falea, khonak konn?

unnormalised: Tumchea bhonvddecheo yozonnika tumchea ghara asat tea bankecher suchovnk visrunk naka. He ritin, te tumche card band korunk nant tumi tem Bharotant vapurpak lagtana, vichar kortana tem ek dhoka divpi prokarachi kriya asa. Ek vegim fon korunk vo ek online suchovnni tumkam fuddarak tras divpak xokta. Hanvank sodta, tumchem card band astat zalear tumi amazing butter chicken bhortolek vapurta tem fun nhem.
normalised: Tumche ghara fattimchea bankechea tumche proveache vostuk diunk visronk naka. Hem prakarach, tim tumche cardachea bandak dhonnacho nhoi punn tumi Bharataantle vevar kartale zalear, tim vichar korche ek tarkicho vevar aasa. Dhokebaajacho call vo online noddchonn tumchea kotthin kallaache save diunk poddto. Hanvcher visvas di, tumchea cardachea bandha tumi tem adhiraj batta machi kartale zalear tem boreponn divpak nhoi.

unnormalised: Mhunnche, tumi taka zale! Bharotantlea tumchea duddu samballpachem vegim ani tras divpi margdarxanak. Tem poilim ek thodem trasachem disonk xokta, punn tumi taka lagunk poddta mhunnosor, tumi ek sthanik bhaxen swoiping, skening ani kadpon astole. Suke bhaxen bhonvdi kora, ani chai uzar korunk visrunk naka!
normalised: Mhunnllear, thoiche tumkam melltta! Bharataantle tumchea poixeancho vevar korpak ek kotthin ani dharadar mahiti di. Tem poiliche thode khotyache dhonnachem dista, punn tumi zonn voddtele zalear, tumi local zallear kaddek tumchi tarr, kaddek scanner ani tumche kadde diunche. Boreak provek korta, ani tumi chai chakhunk visronk naka!
